findGold

public final Queue<edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capabilities.LocationData> findGold(edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capabilities.LocationData from)
Find all known gold locations on the map.

Parameters:
from - the location to sort locaitons from
Returns:
a queue of gold locations sorted by distance from the given location

Returns:

findWumpi

Find all known Wumpi locations on the map.

Parameters:
from - the location to search from
Returns:
a queue of Wumpi locations sorted by distance from the agent's current location

                                              edu.ksu.cis.macr.simulator.capabilities.LocationData to)
Get the collection of tiles between the two given tiles. No tiles are returned if the two given tiles are not in line with each other.

Parameters:
from - the tile to search from
to - the tile to search to
Returns:
